name: WP Custom Admin Login Lite – Free WordPress plugin to make a customized admin login page
author: 8Degree Themes

sections.description:
Homepage | Demo | Documentation | Support

WP Custom Admin Login Lite is a free WP login page customization plugin that can be used to customize your default login page with the WordPress Customizer options. Packaged with 5 beautifully pre-designed templates, the plugin offers lots of customization possibilities. With no coding skill, you can create an outstanding login page in no time. This fully customizer based plugin comes with intuitive interface that allows you to configure your admin login page as per your preference.

The plugin supports color/image background. WP Custom Admin Login Lite is an ultimate plugin to customize your admin login page in a unique and stunning way.

Free Feature list

We have listed all the options available in the plugin.

  • Fully Customizer based plugin
  • Packed with 5 awesome layouts
  • Full customization options with unlimited colors
  • Fully Documented with easy Configuration and video guidance.
  • Supports color and image (Media Library) background
  • Fully Responsive
  • Custom Titles / Texts and Logo
  • Customizable Back to link / Registration link / Logo link
  • Template feasible WYSIWYG containers
  • 5+ Social Icons
  • Custom CSS section

Premium Feature list

  • Fully Customizer based plugin
  • Packed with 20+ awesome layouts
  • Full customization options with unlimited colors
  • Fully Documented with easy Configuration and video guidance.
  • Supports Image (Media Library) and Video (YouTube/Vimeo/MP4) background
  • Fully Responsive
  • Custom Titles / Texts and Logo
  • Customizable Back to link / Registration link / Logo link
  • In-built Google reCaptcha version 2
  • In-built Social Login (Facebook/Twitter/Google+)
  • Template feasible WYSIWYG containers
  • 20+ Social Icons
  • Custom CSS section

Premium Demo | Buy Premium

More Resources

Themes Compatible With Our Plugin :
Eight Degree Posts List Lite works best with every WordPress theme. Its even more remarkable when used with popular themes of ours such as Hamza Pro and The100.

sections.installation:
1. Unzip [plugin].zip
  2. Upload all the files to the /wp-content/plugins/wp-custom-admin-login-lite
  3. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ menu in WordPress.
  4. For customizing the plugin settings, click on WP Custom Admin Login Lite option menu in WordPress left admin menu.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Unzip [plugin].zip
  2. Upload all the files to the /wp-content/plugins/wp-custom-admin-login-lite
  3. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ menu in WordPress.
  4. For customizing the plugin settings, click on WP Custom Admin Login Lite option menu in WordPress left admin menu.

What does this plugin do?

This plugin lets you add your pre-built templates to your existing WP Login Page.

Does the plugin work with Multi-site?

You will be able to register the settings but, you will not be able to view changes through the Cusotmizer. This is due to current Customizer API limitation.

I do not see immediate changes in the Customizer Preview?

In a traditional sense, plugins are not support to work with WordPress Customizer, we use a hack to do so. If you do not find any immediate changes, please save the settings and refresh the page.

Do I need to now any coding to use this plugin?

If you just want a quick template in your site, you do not require any coding. But can add additional CSS if you want.

How can I contact you for support?

You can place your queries in the Support Form. We will reply within 24 hours or you can also use our chat support system at https://8degreethemes.com/

How often do I get updates?

We are not fixed on dates, but we assure you to provide you new updates and feature upgrade in the plugin at regular basis.
